attributes.action: allow the gurkhas to stay in britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the vast majority of british people wiil gladly want the gurkhas to be allowed to stay in great britain. when dangerous people who who threaten our country with there radical veiws are allowed but the gurkhas are not, there has to be something wrong, especailly when you think of the service the gurkhas have done for this once proud country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
